org.apache.cassandra.service

Class EmbeddedCassandraServiceTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.cassandra.service.EmbeddedCassandraServiceTest

  • public class EmbeddedCassandraServiceTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Example how to use an embedded cassandra service. Tests connect to localhost:9160 when the embedded server is running.
